dublin_core.dcvalue: The authors evaluated the psychometrics of a 14 item scale designed to assess attitudes about handheld decision support software In a sample of 103 nursing students a principal components factor analysis resulted in three factors that explained 55 1 of the variance Internal consistency reliability ranged from 71 83
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
Psychometric evaluation of a handheld decision support attitudes scale.
